name: Vegetables Sharks AR
description:
New Vegetables Sharks float right into your home!

Thanks to ARCore, you can play Vegetables Shark AR at home in the living room, in the garden, or wherever you want.

How to play:

Help the sharks eat all the vegetables. Only vegetables can give them the strength and vitamins they need.
But sharks don't know what kind of food is in the barrels.
If the barrels are filled with vegetables, the sharks must eat them. Otherwise, you can't let them eat anything else!
You prepare the sharks for the desired action by touching.
In order to prepare sharks, you have to remember what is hidden in the barrels.
But watch out for other fish as well. You still have to be alert!

Features:

- Vegetables Sharks in AR
- 35 different skins for sharks
- always a unique result picture, that you can share 
- fun animations and effects
- pleasant music and sounds
- a table of the best players and achievements
- daily reward
- AR mode or simple mode
- simple controls
- and other fishes

Vegetables Sharks AR is based on the original game Vegetables Sharks.
This is a memory game designed for children and adults. The game develops your attention, perception, and memory.

You need a device that supports ARCore to play.

-----

Music:
